title: Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven Pot with Lid, for Sourdough Bread Baking, Round Dutch Ovens, 6 Quart, Red
description: Vorringard is the processional cast iron cookware brand, with top quality material and the most advanced DISA machinery casting production line from Denmark, which can guaranteed our high quality product. Our goal is bring every family affordable cast iron cookware with high quality. The classic design and beauty enamel finish and ergonomic looped handles and snug-fitting lid with a stainless steel knob can meet all your cooking needs whether for processional use or home cooking. Cast iron cookware distributes and retains heat evenly, it is suitable for slow cook, fry, roast, bake and so on. With your proper use and care, our enamel cast iron cookware will last for years with its heirloom durability. How to clean: Wash with a warm soapy water and a nylon scrub brush is recommended, avoid metal utensils; Dry promptly and thoroughly with a lint-free cloth or paper towel, preferably while the cookware is still warm; Hanging or storing in a dry and ventilated environment. Porcelain enamel finish is easy to clean and naturally nonstick.
